### Load data

```{r}
geneCountMatrix = read.csv("data/geneCountMatrix.csv")
sample_metadata = read.csv("data/sampleMetadata.csv")
```

### Inspect data

```{r}
nrow(geneCountMatrix)
nrow(geneCountMatrix)

colnames_count_matrix = colnames(geneCountMatrix)
sample_ids <- colnames_count_matrix[-c(1)]

all(sample_metadata$sample_id == sample_ids)
```

### Split dataset

```{r}
Ocular_Motor_Neuron <- sample_metadata |>
  filter(tissue == "Ocular Motor Neuron")

Spinal_Motor_Neuron <- sample_metadata |>
  filter(tissue == "Spinal Motor Neuron")
```

```{r}
Ocular_geneCount <- geneCountMatrix[,c(1:7)]

Spinal_geneCount <- geneCountMatrix[,c(1, 8:13)]
```
